meanings.sent1: The bricklayer built a sturdy wall for the house.
meanings.sent2: The bricklayer worked hard under the sun to construct the new building.
meanings.sent3: The bricklayer joked that he could build a castle out of bricks in a day.
meanings.sent4: She was a bricklayer of words, carefully placing each one to create a strong narrative.
meanings.sent5: The bricklayer's hands were rough from years of laying bricks.

meanings.definition: To lay bricks in a skillful manner.
meanings.sent1: He learned how to bricklayer from his father, who was a master mason.
meanings.sent2: She will bricklayer the patio with precision and care.
meanings.sent3: The children decided to bricklayer a small fort out of toy bricks in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: The artist will bricklayer the pieces of glass together to create a beautiful mosaic.
meanings.sent5: The chef will bricklayer the ingredients in layers to make a delicious lasagna.
